tips: If accidentally billed 2 conflicting codes (e.g., H-code for fracture assessment + C-code for anaesthesia while Ortho reduces fracture), OHIP will only pay for the lower-paying code. Therefore: always bill the higher-paying code.
After using up maximum patient numbers for premium codes, bill normal H assessment codes.
A-codes can only be billed in the ED if doctor called in on-call.
